0.title: Baby wipes for sensitive skin (essential oil free)
0.description:
• Calendula baby cleansing wipes, suitable for cleaning children's face and body skin
  • Contains calendula extract to reduce skin inflammation
  • Contains vitamins E and A to strengthen and repair the skin
  • Anti-allergenic and relieves dry skin
  • It has a pH of 5.5 and is compatible with all skin types
  • Free of parabens, alcohol and soap
  • Quantity: 50 sheets with cover

2.title: Extra slim baby cleaning wipes
2.description:
Extra slim baby wipes, an affordable product for quick and easy cleaning of children's face and body skin.

  • Heals and restores the skin
  • Relieving inflammation caused by burning urine and helping to treat it
  • It has a suitable pH and is compatible with children's delicate skin
  • Free of alcohol, soap and paraben
  • Suitable packaging for all napkins
  • Quantity: 50 sheets + 15% extra
